{"id":412246208,"lang":"python3","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1603457345,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"100 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/412246208/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"14.5 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def findMedianSortedArrays(self, nums1: List[int], nums2: List[int]) -> float:\n        # O(n + m) time and space\n        \n        arr = []\n        i = j = 0\n        n, m = len(nums1), len(nums2)\n        while i < n or j < m:\n            if i >= n or (j < m and nums2[j] < nums1[i]):\n                arr.append(nums2[j])\n                j += 1\n            else:\n                arr.append(nums1[i])\n                i += 1\n        half = (n + m) // 2\n        if (n + m) % 2 == 1:\n            return arr[half]\n        else:\n            return (arr[half - 1] + arr[half]) / 2.0\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
